mainwindow module¶

class mainwindow.MainWindow(app, project_path=None)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Variables

  • app (MyApp) – Object MyApp.

  • project (Project) – A Project object retrieved from existing project file(.pkl) or a empty Project object with default setting.

  • menutopbar (MyMenuBar) – mainwindow’s menubar.

  • wg_canvas (MyCanvas) – A self-defined QWidget component placed on the center of the mainwindow.

  • dwg_data (DockWidget_Data) – A self-defined QDockWidget placed on the left area by default that contains imported data listing by a treelist and several functions interacting with the canvases.

  • dwg_canvasLayout (DockWidget_CanvasLayout) – A self-defined QDockWidget placed on the left area by default that buttons in order to switch canvas layout mode and customize canvas setting.

initUI()¶

Initial mainwindow’s user interface.

btn_clearData_handleClicked()¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_clearData When the button is clicked, all imported datas and curves on canvases would be cleared.

btn_processingDlg_handleClicked()¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_processingDlg When the button is clicked, execute OperationDialog and pop up a dialog window.

btn_axis_setting_handleClicked()¶

This function connect with QPushButton component btn_axis_setting When the button is clicked, execute CanvasSetting_Dialog and pop up a dialog window.

It is used for customizing which curve types CurveType would be drawn on a canvas. Each canvas has main axis and sub axis. After dialog window closed, update related component with new setting.

append_file(file)¶

Append a new imported file to attributes project, And also append to the treelist in DockWidget component dwg_data.

Parameters

file (FileData) – A FileData object generated from the imported file.

save_file()¶

Save project to file. If this project is “Untitled”, which is the default name for a new project, it would execute QFileDialog and pop up a dialog window letting user to determain a new name and where to save. Otherwise, it would be updated to the origin project file.
